Here are the results of the third annual Samurai Fiction contest.  The
link=
 to all of the stories, with genres and authors listed can be
found here: h=
ttp://forums.samurai-archives.com/viewtopic.php?t=3D1793

Congratulations t=
o all of the winners, and in general, the high
quality of all of the entrie=
s this year. I hope to have the stories on
the samurai archives site by the=
 end of next week.

Best Writing:
=
